items.title: Introducing Build Mode: TechCrunch’s new podcast for founders
items.summary: Build Mode is our new podcast that will be a survival guide for early-stage founders navigating the messy, high-stakes chaos of building a company from scratch, hosted by Startup Battlefield Editor Isabelle Johannessen.

items.title: Ghana's former First Lady Nana Konadu Rawlings dies aged 76
items.summary: She was married to Ghana's longest-serving leader Jerry John Rawlings and known for her women's rights work.

items.title: PUBG maker Krafton is turning into an ‘AI first’ developer
items.summary: Krafton, the company behind games such as PUBG: Battlegrounds and the Sims-like InZOI, is making a big push into using AI within the company. Under this new “AI First” strategy, Krafton plans to use agentic AI to help automate work and implement an “AI-cenetered” management system, according to a translation of a press release. The […]

items.title: San Francisco Mayor Daniel Lurie is coming to TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.summary: San Francisco Mayor Daniel Lurie steps onto the Disrupt Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, October 27-29 at Moscone West, in a homecoming of sorts for both tech and the city that helped define it.

items.title: Mexican president says US players involved in fuel smuggling

Don’t forget to enter promo code EJ3NIM43 during checkout to see the discounted price. After debuting on Kickstarter last year at $38, this model later arrived on Amazon with a $50 list price. It has previously dropped to $36, but today’s 42% discount takes another $7 off to mark a new all-time low. This is the best price we’ve tracked yet for this bi-fold wallet, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

The station on its own normally carries an $1,899 MSRP directly from the brand, while going for $1,399 at Amazon, and the solar hat would cost an additional $129 on top of that – with current discounted pricing for both costing you $998 right now ($899 + $99). Before today, the lowest price we’ve seen for the station has been $899, with the exclusive savings giving you an extra $100 slashed from the tag (plus the $99 hat) for a new all-time low price.

items.title: ICC judges reject jurisdiction challenge by Philippines ex-president Duterte
items.summary: THE HAGUE (Reuters) -Judges at the International Criminal Court (ICC) have rejected a challenge to the court's jurisdiction in a case against former Philippines president Rodrigo Duterte and said his case can move forward, a court decision published on Thursday showed. Instead, it will be out at some unspecified point in 2026. […]

Only on the market for a handful of months with a $430 full price, discounts have mostly kept things above $260, until the Prime Day event two weeks ago dropped things to the $230 low for the first time. Now, with the bonus coupon, we’re getting a second chance to pick it up at its best price, with a total $200 cut from the tag for the lowest tracked rate.

items.title: Putin says Russia will never bow to US pressure, warns on missiles
items.summary: MOSCOW (Reuters) -President Vladimir Putin said on Thursday that Moscow would never bow to pressure from the United States or any other foreign power, and cautioned that it would deliver an "overwhelming" response to any military strikes deep inside Russia. Read full story

items.title: Google’s bets on carbon capture power plants, which have a mixed record
items.summary: Google intends to use electricity from the 400-MW power plant in Decatur, Illinois, to operate nearby data centers. Carbon capture will eliminate some of the plant's emissions, but how much remains to be seen.

items.title: Tensormesh raises $4.5M to squeeze more inference out of AI server loads
items.summary: Tensormesh uses an expanded form of KV caching to make inference loads as much as 10 times more efficient.

items.title: Anker’s 15W Qi2 MagSafe car charger with 5-ft USB-C cable & 25W adapter is 50% off at $30 low
items.summary:
As part of its wider sale on charging accessories, Woot is offering Anker’s 15W Qi2 MagSafe wireless car charger for $29.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This model typically goes for $60 and comes with a built-in 5-foot USB-C cable and a 25W power adapter. While Anker has since replaced it with a newer 25W Qi2 Prime version that’s currently going for $74 on Amazon, today’s deal brings the older model back down to its lowest price – a 50% discount that saves you $30. It’s a great pick for folks who just want a reliable, everyday charger for quick top-ups on the road without paying extra for max-speed charging. Head below for more details.

items.title: Natural Titanium Apple Watch Series 10 Milanese model hits all-time low at $196 off
items.summary:
Update 10/23: The 42mm Natural Titanium Apple Watch Series 10 with the matching Milanese Loop just dropped again down to a new $553 shipped Amazon all-time low – that’s $196 off the original list price.

We have featured a few notable chances to land some particularly deep deals on the now previous-generation, but still quite compelling Apple Watch Series 10 over the last month or so. Most recently it has been the elevated titanium models and we just spotted another configuration dropping lower than ever today. Head below for more details and up to nearly $200 in savings on Series 10 models. 

more…

items.title: PSA: The new Philips Hue Bridge Pro is finally back in stock
items.summary:
We are just touching down quickly this morning to let folks know the new Philips Hue Bridge Pro is finally back in-stock on the official site. While you can find the new Bridge Pro as part of bundles at retailers like Amazon, scoring it on its own has been tough as of late and you can land it right now straight from Philips if you’re quick. 

more…

items.title: New UGREEN NASync system adds up to 60TB to your workflow with remote access, app support, more at $189 [Launch deal]
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find UGREEN’s official storefront offering its latest NASync DH2300 2-Bay Desktop NAS for $188.99 shipped. Don’t forget to clip the on-page coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. This model just launched at $210, joining the rest of UGREEN’s growing NAS lineup, and today’s deal marks the first discount we’ve seen. It’s not a massive markdown, but the 10% savings definitely make it a bit easier on the wallet. Something like this would be ideal anyone constantly running out of storage or juggling multiple SSDs and HDDs. It offers a more streamlined way to manage your files, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

more…

items.title: Only 4 days until TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 kicks off in San Francisco and ticket rates increase
items.summary: The wait all year is almost over! In just 4 days, TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 takes over San Francisco's Moscone West and with it the future of tech. This is your final chance to join the founders, investors, and innovators shaping the future before ticket prices increase. Save up to $444 and 60% on a second pass now.
